name: Jony Ive
description: Apple 前设计总监风格，极简主义

styles.container: max-width: 620px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 16px 24px 40px 24px; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "SF Pro Display", "SF Pro Text", "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; line-height: 1.6 !important; color: #6e6e73 !important; background-color: #fbfbfd !important; word-wrap: break-word;

h1.base: font-size: 39px; font-weight: 200; color: #1d1d1f !important; line-height: 1.15 !important; margin: 48px 0 24px; letter-spacing: -0.025em;

h2.base: font-size: 28px; font-weight: 300; color: #1d1d1f !important; line-height: 1.2 !important; margin: 40px 0 20px; letter-spacing: -0.018em;

h3.base: font-size: 20px; font-weight: 400; color: #1d1d1f !important; line-height: 1.25 !important; margin: 32px 0 16px; letter-spacing: -0.008em;

list.item: margin: 12px 0; line-height: 1.6 !important; color: #6e6e73 !important; padding-left: 24px; position: relative; font-weight: 300;
list.taskList: margin: 12px 0; line-height: 1.6 !important; color: #6e6e73 !important; padding-left: 24px; position: relative; font-weight: 300; list-style: none;

code.block: margin: 28px 0; padding: 20px; background-color: #f5f5f7 !important; border-radius: 10px; overflow-x: auto; line-height: 1.5 !important;
code.inline: font-family: "SF Mono", Monaco, Menlo, monospace; font-size: 14px; padding: 2px 6px; background-color: #f5f5f7 !important; color: #6e6e73 !important; border-radius: 6px; font-weight: 400;

styles.quote: margin: 32px auto; padding: 0; background-color: transparent !important; border-left: none; color: #1d1d1f !important; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.4 !important; font-weight: 300; text-align: center; max-width: 520px; font-style: normal;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; max-height: 600px !important; height: auto; display: block; margin: 40px auto; border-radius: 10px;

table.header: background-color: #f5f5f7 !important; padding: 12px 16px; text-align: left; border: none; font-weight: 500; color: #1d1d1f !important;
table.cell: padding: 12px 16px; border: none; border-top: 1px solid #d2d2d7; color: #6e6e73 !important; font-weight: 300;

styles.hr: margin: 56px auto; border: none; height: 1px; background-color: #d2d2d7 !important; max-width: 48px;
